item.title: Suspected 'witchdoctors' arrested over attempt to 'bewitch' Zambia's president
item.description: The pair were found with magic charms, including a live chameleon, the police say.

item.title: US diplomats cancel briefing in Damascus over security concerns
item.description: The first appearance of a formal US delegation in more than a decade is a sign of dramatic shifts since Assad's fall.

item.title: Six killed in strike on Russia's Kursk after deadly missile attack on Kyiv
item.description: A reported attack on a Russian town comes after Ukraine said Moscow had launched a new attack on Kyiv.

item.title: Who is affected by a US government shutdown?
item.description: Here's how the US got to the brink of yet another funding lapse and what it means for Americans - and Trump.

item.title: 'I'd rather die than leave my mum': Survivors describe Mayotte cyclone horror
item.description: The BBC hears how roofs flew off homes as people sheltered inside in the cyclone-hit French territory.
